item.title: 格尔多冻结 4 亿美元巴西支出，关注美国增长
item.description: 巴西钢铁制造商 Gerdau 以市场前景疲软和中国廉价钢材激增为由，搁置了在巴西的 21 亿雷亚尔（约合 4 亿美元）投资计划。【原文：Brazilian steelmaker Gerdau has put 2.1 billion reais ($400 million) of planned investments in Brazil on hold, citing weak market prospects and the surge of cheap Chinese steel.】

item.title: Cucinelli 确认增长目标，拒绝 "卖空 "说法
item.description: 布鲁内罗-库奇内利公司（Brunello Cucinelli SpA）确认了其全年增长目标，因为对该公司奢华羊绒制品的持续需求使其前九个月的销售额跃升了11%。这家意大利时装集团驳斥了做空者提出的导致其股价出现有史以来最大跌幅的说法。【原文：Brunello Cucinelli SpA confirmed its target for full-year growth as sales jumped by 11% in the first nine months on continued demand for the company’s luxury cashmere products. The Italian fashion group rejected claims by a short seller that had led to the steepest drop on record in its shares.】

item.title: 微软将人工智能服务纳入 Office 以对抗 ChatGPT
item.description: 微软公司正在将其面向消费者的人工智能订阅服务并入 Office，打赌该生产力套件的普遍性将帮助公司更好地与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 竞争。【原文：Microsoft Corp. is folding its artificial intelligence subscription service for consumers into Office, betting that the productivity suite’s ubiquity will help the company better compete against OpenAI’s ChatGPT.】

item.title: EIA 警告：美国核电厂面临不断扩大的铀供应缺口
item.description: 美国能源信息署警告说，未来十年美国核电企业可能面临铀短缺问题，这凸显了世界上最大的原子能市场所面临的供应链挑战。【原文：US nuclear utilities face possible uranium shortages over the next decade, the Energy Information Administration warned, underscoring supply chain challenges in the world’s biggest atomic-power market.】

item.description: 据知情人士透露，摩根大通公司（JPMorgan Chase & Co.【原文：Banks are vying for a slice of the roughly $500 million of fees tied to JPMorgan Chase & Co.’s $20 billion debt financing backing the take-private of Electronic Arts Inc., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 随着购物者转向更高级的特产鸡蛋，Cal-Maine 品牌鸡蛋价格暴跌
item.description: 美国最大的鸡蛋生产商 Cal-Maine Foods Inc. 注意到了市场上的一个主要趋势：消费者正在转向他们认为更可持续的高端品种。【原文：Cal-Maine Foods Inc., the top US egg producer, is noticing a major trend in the market: consumers are shifting to fancier varieties that they consider to be more sustainable.】

item.title: First Brands 贷款人出资 44 亿美元避免清算
item.description: 据法庭文件显示，First Brands Group LLC 的众多贷款人 "以迅雷不及掩耳之势 "提供了 44 亿美元的破产保护融资，公司顾问称，这将使这家汽车零部件供应商在匆忙申请破产后避免清算。【原文：A broad group of First Brands Group LLC lenders “have worked at lightening-speed” to provide $4.4 billion of Chapter 11 financing that company advisers said will allow the auto-parts supplier to avoid liquidation after its rushed bankruptcy filing, according to court papers.】

item.title: 欧洲检察官调查北方数据公司 5 亿欧元收购 GPU 案
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，一项刑事调查上周突袭了北方数据公司（Northern Data AG）的办公室，重点调查该公司是否非法为价值约 5 亿欧元（约合 5.86 亿美元）的高性能计算芯片申请减税。【原文：A criminal investigation that led to raids of Northern Data AG’s offices last week is focused on whether the company illegally claimed a tax break on about €500 million ($586 million) worth of high-performance computing chips, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 法国电力创二十年新低，冬季来临前供应充足
item.description: 法国上月强劲的核电和可再生能源产出将当日平均电价推至二十年来 9 月份的最低点，凸显了供暖季开始后的健康供应状况。【原文：France’s strong nuclear and renewables output last month pushed average day-ahead power prices to the lowest for a September in two decades, highlighting a healthy supply picture as the heating season starts.】

item.title: 博鳌亚洲论坛对 9 月份创纪录的公司债券狂潮感到惊讶
item.description: 9 月份，公司在美国投资级市场上的借款额达到创纪录的 2,070 亿美元，超过了华尔街最大的债务承销商美国银行公司的预期。【原文：Companies borrowed a record $207 billion in the US investment-grade market in September, more than Wall Street’s top underwriter of the debt Bank of America Corp., had expected.】

item.title: 欧佩克+增加供应，沙特石油出口飙升至 18 个月新高

item.title: 赛勒有望免征 15%的公司税，战略上升

item.title: 谷歌通过新款摄像头、门铃和扬声器将双子座人工智能带入家庭
item.description: Alphabet Inc. 旗下的谷歌公司周三推出了一系列新的 Nest 品牌硬件，就在亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc. ）举行自己的产品展示会的前一天，两家公司都在争夺将人工智能更深入地整合到整个智能家居中。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google introduced a range of new Nest-branded hardware on Wednesday, just a day after Amazon.com Inc. held its own product showcase, as both companies vie to more deeply integrate artificial intelligence throughout the smart home.】

item.title: 美元暴跌使外汇储备占比降至 30 年最低点
item.description: 外国中央银行库房中的美元比例达到了 1995 年以来的最低点，这一变化是由货币急剧下跌而不是持有量减少造成的。【原文：The proportion of dollars in the coffers of foreign central banks hit its lowest mark since 1995, a shift driven by a steep decline in the currency rather than a reduction in holdings.】

item.title: 元开始使用聊天机器人对话定位广告
item.description: Meta Platforms 公司不久将开始利用与其人工智能聊天机器人的互动，更有效地定制人们在 Facebook 和 Instagram 上看到的内容和广告。【原文：Meta Platforms Inc. will soon start using interactions with its AI chatbot to more effectively tailor the content and advertising that people see on Facebook and Instagram.】
